titles.title: A resolution supporting the establishment of a President's Youth Council.
A resolution supporting the establishment of a President's Youth Council.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Supports the creation of the Presidential Youth Council to advise the President on the creation and implementation of new federal policies and programs that pertain to and affect American youth.
